c74object.name: bl.viewersnaps
c74object.description: Provides an easy-to-acces interface to storing, recalling and interpolating between snapshots of positions of objects in a spat5.viewer of spat5.oper.

inlet.digest: Messages from the dump outlet of a spat5.viewer
Methods: store, recall, import, export, xsnapshot

method.name: store
method.description: Store current positions of every source and speaker in the spat5.viewer.

method.name: import
method.description: Import a group of snapshots into the internal dict from a JSON or YAML file.

method.name: export
method.description: Save all snapshots (ie. the content of the internal dict) into a JSON or YAML file.

method.name: xsnapshot
method.description: Linearly interpolate between two stored snapshots based on an interpolation ratio between 0 and 1. When the ratio is 0, the output will be identical to the snapshot referenced as the first argument. When the ratio is 1, the output will be identical to the snapshot referenced as the second argument.
